title: Font for modern Oldworld hotel
content:
I am looking for a font to use for the identity of a new boutique hotel that is all about a modern take on ’old world’ it needs to be a great family that is versatile like Mercury by Hoefler Frere Jones. I need a capital M with diagonal legs like the capital M in Calligraph 810, but don’t like it to look like it was calligraphy.... Please help?

Eben

comments.content:
- What city?  
- What kind of people are supposed to stay there?  
- What does the building look like?

BTW, if you find a font that you really like but it has a non-splayed “M”, you could always just make a splayed one - or pay a pro to do it, since it’s tricky - in fact it’s technically the most difficult Latin cap letter. Usually I myself make complete fonts, but last year I made a custom “C” for a restaurant in Singapore: [http://www.manic.com.sg/work\_macaron.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081206232732/http:/www.manic.com.sg/work_macaron.html "http://www.manic.com.sg/work\_macaron.html")
